comment: AMAZING teacher!! You dont need to buy the book unless you want to do extra credit with Videos. Speeches are very easy! All around she makes class fun and very entertaining! Love her!
AWESOME teacher!! Go to class and give your speeches. She is so nice and very helpful! Easy A or B
Go to class. Boring class because of the topic but Ms. O is funny and very helpful. Make sure you do the speeches and extra work and it's an easy A. Just put forth effort.
GO TO CLASS!!  She stays on top of attendance.  She's funny and helpful.  I'd take her again!

She stays on top of attendance so you MUST go to class.  She's really sweet and can be a little repetitive.  No laptops or cell phones in class. An easy A if you go to class and give your speeches on time. If you don't make at least a B in this class you didn't put forth an effort...its just that easy.

Her class was fairly easy. She gave reviews for the mid-term and final, which were word-for-word on the test. At times her lecture became repetitive, but other than that I feel like I learned a lot from her, and became a better speaker. I would take her again!

Ms. Ohanenye is great!  She was a little confusing at first, but give her a chance and dont drop her.  She is funny and extremely helpful if you are confused, and very flexible on changing due dates to make the class happy. She is understanding and empathetic. She's really great, I wish she taught more than just speaking! If you can grab her class!

at the begging of the semester she was all over the place but once she got acclimated the class got better. easy speeches and test she will go easy on you if you come to class every day and participate

She was hired a few days before the start of the semester, so she was kind of unorganized at the beginning. She grades very easily on the speeches and the test is given to you. She is very nice and a great person to talk to. She is willing to work with students so they can do their best.
She's willing to help all her students in the best way she can.
